code: import axios from'axios';const REST_API_URL='http://localhost:8080/api/tasks';export const listTask=async()=>await axios.get(REST_API_URL);export const createTask=async task=>await axios.post(REST_API_URL,task);export const getTask=async id=>await axios.get(`${REST_API_URL}/${id}`);export const updateTask=async(id,task)=>await axios.post(`${REST_API_URL}/${id}`,task);export const deleteTask=async id=>await axios.delete(`${REST_API_URL}/${id}`);
